# iamunused
Scan and remediate unused permissions within IAM Policies

## Getting started

### Requrirements
 * AWS CLI version 2

### Installation

```sh
pip3 install iamunused
```

### Upgrade

```sh
pip3 install -U iamunused
```


### Scan

```sh
python -m iamunused
```
